Blog.post: well! originally i had a thing at xanga.com but then ryan told me that i should make a blogger.com one so here we are. anyways tomorrow is my canoeing trip with adventure ed and that should be cool. friday to saturday is relay for life. sunday to tuesday is the camping trip! im going to have a very busy weekend indeed. not much is going on haha. im off my meds for the time being and im not sure how i feel about that. croo is going good, im officially a lighting flunkie, one of noah's "babies" as he calls us, that or we are his lighting bitches/wenches. haha. my birthday wasnt horrible but it wasnt great either. emma never said happy birthday to me which really made me sad. i can live with her not wanting to be friends but the least she could have done would have been to acknowledge my birthday. hell i called her from florida and even got her a brithday present. but i guess you cant stop people from being bitches and screwing you over. hell, ive lost enough friends in the past couple years to know that much. mr moran played his guitar and sang for us in class yesterday, it was quite enjoyable. anyways i really need to find a guy to hang out with again, either that or i need to find some time to chill with torey. we definitely had some good times. oh does anyone know the new mookie site? stupid computer people at school blocked the mookie.x7h.com one. oh well! amanda and laura called me on my brithday and that definitely increased my mood to happy at least. im going to ron of japan tonight with my aunt and grandparents so i need to go and work on homework now. love you all lots!

last night i went out with torey and dani to flatop for dinner. then we went and saw dodgeball. HILARIOUS movie! the movie was over at like 9 so we went over to blockbuster, rented good will hunting, and went to toreys and chilled til 11. today ive been cleaning and running little errands. me and suzanne got lunch at noodles and co. yummy place. thats all thats going on. i really should take dani's advice and make a move but im too chicken shit haha. anyways ill write some more later on.
ryan i miss talking to you!

im back from oregon! i had such a great time. i went camping for three days with my cousin and aunt. lets see, we went to this kick ass waterpark/amusement park in washington. i got to go take a tour of Western Oregon University (WOU) and Willamette University. i liked both but i liked WOU better. it was really nice. one day we went to OMSI (oregon museum of science and industry) with the kids that my cousin is a nanny for. my aunt took me and my little cousin whos 1 to the zoo also. i got to take a ride on the vespa, learned how to drive a stick shift. the entire trip was great. the puppies are SO cute. theres 8 of them and they are 4 weeks old so i got to hang around them a lot and help take care of them. well i g2g ill write more later about my trip...

this is most likely going to be my last post until i get back from oregon. anyways i went to panera with laura for lunch. then we went scandalous skirt shoppping! i have to admit that it was lots of fun trying on way too short skirts. laura ended up buying one. shes got the body to pull it off without looking too ho ish, i dont haha. anyways tonight dad is bbqing and then after dinner im going back to lauras. were going to rent a movie and chill. her mom is going to work on my scrapbook while im gone so shes going to interview me on my pictures. gd i was so pissed this afternoon. i went to get gas, and i always put my gas cap on the trunk while i fill up my tank. anyways i drive away, get all the way to church and crawford (i went to a gas station by old orchard) and realize i didnt put the cap back on. so i drive back to the gas station but its no where in sight. im pretty sure it got run over. anyways it cost 20 bucks to buy a new gas cap and it just really made me mad that i forgot cause i always ALMOST forget. laura was with me and i just tensed up and stopped talking and she was like, hey its ok, you can get a new one, your dad wasnt mad about it so dont worry. so she made me feel better but i totally blew up at dad and i feel bad that i took it out on him. he went out on his way home and bought me a new one too. anyways ive gotta go and finish packing. were leaving for the airport about quarter to 7 tomorrow morning. FUN! love you lots ryan! have a great move!

i feel asleep last night at ike 6, cause i wanted to take a nap, and well i didnt wake up until just now! it felt good to sleep but i sorta ditched lizi and caroline...opps. anyways im about to start packing, i gotta be at the airport by 730 tomrrow which sucks ass but hopefully ill sleep somewhat on the airplane...yeah right haha, i HATE flying. anyways i g2 get going so i can run a few errands today too. love you all

went to old orchard with the family, got some shorts and a kick ass pillow! anyways i need to clean my room and start packing up my shit for oregon. i really am excited! well its defintely time for a nap, then ill hit the shower

today there was school for an hour---you go to homebase for first period, then you get to walk around and collect your grades from your teachers. anyways ill add more to this post later, lillie has her school singing show in about half an hour and i need to run an errand first. toodles!

tonight i went to dani's house, picked her up, and we went and rented kill bill and texas chainsaw massacre. i couldnt handle the latter so i made dani turn it off haha! ive already seen kill bill and i love it so it was fun watching that one. howard called us half way thru to talk to dani but we were WAY too involved in kill bill haha. anyways im being yelled at to go to sleep so i guess i better

tonight im going to chill with dani. were going to rent a movie and partay til the break of dawn haha. anyways im still contemplating whether or not i should go to school tomorrow. on the upside i would get my grades, on the downside i have to wake up at 7 AND i have to walk all over the freakin school. any thoughts?

went to the gap with laura to return some stuff and i got a pair of jeans. then we went thrift store shopping! i love thrift stores haha. anyways i have no idea what im going to do tonight. last night we went to flattop and then bowling, thats me, tay, laura, torey and chuck. to tell the truth, chuck was an asshole the entire ride home, talking bout how i should let him drive. then the entire car agreed and chuck was like, youve been in two accidents, i havent been in any. then taylor was like, what about the fire hydrant. that counts as an accident. i really cant belive she brought that up, ive only told a couple of people and it just really pissed me off that she said something. i mean, i dont spread shit she tells me. gd damnit, im just really upset with the majority of my friends right now. aynways i need to go clean my room
i am in such a fowl mood right now. im so sick of my parents. all they do is nag nag and nag some more. cant they stop for just a little bit?

took my last final today, history. it was easy but extremely long, 259 questions to be exact. we got 5 points if we wrote our name in caps...i love moran and walsh haha. anyways im relieved to be done with school pretty much, just got like an hour of school friday so we can get our grades. tonight im going to flatop with laura and possibly some others tho im not totally sure yet who all is going. my computer is finally fixed so ive been downloading lots of music all day haha. right now im listening to maroon 5, songs about jane. well its time for me to take a nap, ill write later

finals have been relatively easy so far. im a little worried about my history---not that its going to be hard but i heard that its long as hell. anyways english final was a joke, chem was actually challenging, and child psych was an easy A. i am SO excited to go to oregon! i leave on sunday for two weeks! my cousin and aunt are gonna take me camping in their new RV! we are just going to have such a blast the entire time. anyways i g2g make my history cheat sheet---byebye dani---you are right!

I have been so incredibly busy lately that i havent been able to post anything for a while. that and the fact that the only computer ive been able to use up until tonight was the school computer which of course blocks blogs...haha. anyways finals are this week and then on saturday im off to oregon for two weeks! im so totally excited. i really should be sleeping but i have SO much work to do that it is insane...gotta go!

friday i went over to sarah and annie's house about 5. i ended up going home at 7 cause joe came home but then he went out with ben so i ended up eating dinner at home. then about 845 dani picked me up and we went to go see The Village...the 925 show ended up being sold out so we waited around and saw the 1030 show. i really liked it but the ending was sorta a let down. the movie was nothing like i thought it would be tho. but i thought it was good. anyways i got home about 1 and then this morning aroung 1030 we (mom, lillie, jen, my aunt) went to the zoo. we had fun. then i babysat tonight which was a pain in the ass. im supposed to go out wiht laura now but she went out with some other people...SAD!!! i was ditched, oh well! anyways im going to go and do something else.............ADIOS

oh yes i almost forgot...i got a letter from amanda yesterday!!! omg i am SO happy to hear from her, it totally made my day. i really wish that i was on seminar with her. after reading her letter i went and looked up pictures of their trip so far and i saw all my camp friends and it just made me so "homesick" for camp. i know im not going to get a chance to go to israel anytime soon, if ever at all and it absolutely sucks. on the bright side im going to go and visit her over thanksgiving most likely and that makes me feel a little better.

lets see...went mini golfing with mom and lillie yesterday morning. then went mini golfing with torey and dani that night haha. we went to ihop and ate around 930 and then torey and dani came back to my house to watch Badder Santa(which is the unrated version of Bad Santa) and they were at my house til about 1230. today i ran like 10 errands for my mom which was totally insane. anyways then laura came over and we finished off Sex and the City...then ate dinner with my family and went for a bike ride. i got the results of my blood work from last week and its not good at all. no details here, who knows who could be reading this! haha. anyways i keep leaving joe in the middle of our conversations cause me computer either freezes or restarts itself...SORRY JOE! other than that, not much is new and interesting in my life. right now im listening to music and downloading new music! ryan i REALLY need to chat with you so try to get online sometime if you can. thats all for now love everyone lots!

today i went with mom and lillie to build-a-bear and got to make a bunny---its VERY cute. afterwards i came home and washed my car. of course about ten minutes after i finish washing it, it begins to rain! it DID look good, too. i saw laura wadden and ben stoler kissing while i walked cocoa...such a pleasant picture haha. anyways dani is coming over soon and we are going to go see The Village . i dont care if ome people didnt like it, ive been wanting to see this movie for the past month and a half. anyways i havent been able to talk to ryan or joe for the longest time and miss them both incredibly! love you boys!

caroline's birthday party was lots of fun. i got her a cresent wrench, pocket knife, and an umbrella hat! it started to rain half an hour after the party started so we headed back to caroline's house and watched tv and hung out. we had a giant gummy bear fight...it got prettttty crazy haha. that was tuesday night. yesterday dani and i went to the golf thing on oakton and did the driving range. then we had a kick ass sex and the city marathon night! today i went and had my blood drawn finally after being lazy the past couple days. who knows what is going on the rest of the day. ill probably give torey a call and see if he wants to chill tonight. love you ryan!

ive had a VERY busy weekend. saturday i was gone all day at kristals. that night i babysat, then afterwards went and slept at kristals house. sunday morning i came home and we took a family trip to the 7 Mile Fair. after 5 hours of that (we got home about 330) laura came over and so did my grandparents, aunt and uncles and cousin. so we had family dinner. after dinner luara and i rode on bikes to dani's, got her, and came back and made smoothies and had a sex and the city marathon. monday i went to lambs farm with my mom and sis, i also managed to drag dani with. we went to dani's house when we were done with that and made chocolate covered pretzels...yum! then last ngiht we had yet another big family dinner, this time at a restaurant. dani and i went biking thru sculpture park last night. today i spent at taylors. and now we reach tonight, which i will spend at carolines birthday party. i got her the BEST present ever...which i will disclose after the party haha. anyways i am REALLY looking forward to sleep tonight. ive gotta go! i miss ya ryan!
i am totally freakin out right now about college. it just hit me the other day that i only have one year of high school left...AHH! where is ryan when i need him! or where is joe too!
taylors coming over! 1. play croquet 2. play polo fun fun fun!

i had to babysit lillie last night. umm lets see, ran a bunch of errands today and started to read the book for AP english! got to chapter 6, woo hoo! anyways tonight we are doing a family out to dinner thing. thats all for now

last night we went to jenny's circus camp thing, which was ok. afterwards i picked up dani and we went to chili's for dinner. we rented good will hunting and chilled at her house. today i finish cleaning my room out, its mostly done which is awesome. otnight i have to babysit so there goes my idea of giving torey a buzz...oh well. i had an extremely interesting dream the other night about him actually haha. anyways, ive gotta go! miss you ryan!

last night i went and finally saw farhenheit 9/11---really good movie, i highly recommend that everyone go out and see it. anyways the 4th of the july wasnt horrible, went to the parade, aunts bbq, sarah and annies bbq, fireworks. im in the process of organizing my room, but then again im ALWAYS in that process. miss you lots ryan!

so today is the 4th...ive gotta go over to my aunt and uncles house later today, but other than that, nothing much is going on. im supposed to chill with laura but who knows whats going to happen. anyways ive gotta go ryan where are you!

last night i went over to annie/sarah's house and chilled. sarah was babysitting so it was just me, annie, lizi and caroline. we sat around and chatted for a couple of hours. there was a big scandal the last day of school and ben and annie got caught using their keys...DRAMA! anyways i did absolutely nothing today which i absolutely loved. now im off to beddy bie...

not much has been happening with me lately. went to sarah and annie's joined birthday party last night which was TONS of fun. my brother is an ass but that is nothing new. oh yeah, ryan, i am soo glad that you have finally found a guy that is just as great as you are!!! yay for you! back to me, i went to the bakery today with laura and said hi to the garzas---it was SO good to see them, they are totally awesome people. umm lets see, i hung out with laura and her dan man haha, hes a totally cool kid and its good to finally meet some of her wayland people. im going to most likely give torey a call tonight and see if he wants to chill. other than that, nothing is going on in my life. too bad, huh? love alycia
